con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="api loop"/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results with test properties" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="AFG with auth"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:config.script:
import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.TestStepResult.TestStepStatus
for (int i =0; i < 100; i++) { log.info "In step number" + i myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("distributions") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("search") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("search_all") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("company_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("price_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("priceHistory_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("keydevs_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() }

import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.TestStepResult.TestStepStatus
for (int i =0; i < 10000; i++) { log.info "In step number" + i myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("distributions") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("search") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("company_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("price_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("priceHistory_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("keydevs_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() }

import com.eviware.soapui.support.types.StringToStringMap
String xauth = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("login").httpRequest.response.responseHeaders["X-AUTH-TOKEN"] log.info "auth" + xauth def headers = new StringToStringMap() headers.put("X-AUTH-TOKEN",xauth) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("search_filter").testRequest.setRequestHeaders(headers) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("search_all").testRequest.setRequestHeaders(headers) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("company_AFG").testRequest.setRequestHeaders(headers) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("price_AFG").testRequest.setRequestHeaders(headers) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("priceHistory_AFG").testRequest.setRequestHeaders(headers) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("keydevs_AFG").testRequest.setRequestHeaders(headers)

import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.TestStepResult.TestStepStatus
for (int i =0; i < 10000; i++) { log.info "In step number" + i myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("distributions") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("search") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("company_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("price_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("priceHistory_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() myTestStepResult = testRunner.runTestStepByName("keydevs_533") myStatus = myTestStepResult.getStatus() if (myStatus == TestStepStatus.OK) log.info "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() else log.error "The step status is: " + myStatus.toString() }

import com.eviware.soapui.support.types.StringToStringMap
String xauth = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("login").httpRequest.response.responseHeaders["X-AUTH-TOKEN"] log.info "auth" + xauth def headers = new StringToStringMap() headers.put("X-AUTH-TOKEN",xauth) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("sendWatchListEmail").testRequest.setRequestHeaders(headers)
